hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "Whoever sees me in a dream will see me in his wakefulness, and Satan cannot imitate me in shape." Abu `Abdullah said, "Ibn Seereen said, 'Only if he sees the Prophet (ﷺ) in his (real) shape

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ رَأَى النَّبِيَّ صلى الله عليه وسلم فِي الْمَنَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever saw the Prophet (ﷺ) in a dream
